name: cloudfest-usa-2025-local-env
description: Local development environment for CloudFest USA 2025 Hackathon - FAIR, AspireCloud, CVE Labeller, and PatchStack integration

scripts.aspirecloud:clear: docker exec -w /app cloudfest-aspirecloud php artisan optimize:clear
scripts.aspirecloud:update: docker pull ghcr.io/aspirepress/aspirecloud:latest && docker-compose up -d --force-recreate aspirecloud && bash scripts/init-aspirecloud.sh
scripts.cve-labeller:clear: docker exec -w /app cloudfest-cve-labeller php artisan optimize:clear

author: Alain Schlesser
